def get_movie_info(self, id):
        import requests
        from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
        import json
        urlx = "https://www.imdb.com/title/"+id
        result = ""
        try:
            response = requests.get(url=urlx, timeout=30)
            body = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
            vardata = str(body.find(type="application/ld+json"))
            vardata = vardata.replace(
                '<script type="application/ld+json">', "")
            vardata = vardata.replace('</script>', "")
            result = json.loads(vardata)
            print(result)
        except:
            self.error_log(id)
        return result

def get_movie_poster(self, id):
        posterx = ""
        try:
            import requests
            from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
            import json
            urlx = "https://www.imdb.com/title/"+id
            response = requests.get(url=urlx, timeout=30)
            body = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
            if hasattr(body.find("div", {"class": "poster"}), 'findChildren'):
                img = body.find("div", {"class": "poster"}).findChildren("img")
                posterx = img[0]['src']
                return posterx
        except:
            self.error_log(id)
        return True
